ygData.subject: Wrong address...
ygData.msgSnippet: Sideways limped along as the two Minicons helped him stand. Heh, didn t expect these bio freaks to be the cunning... I won t forget that bots face... He

Sideways limped along as the two Minicons helped him stand. "Heh, 
didn't expect these bio freaks to be the cunning... I won't forget 
that bots face... He lifted his arm as the techno poison continued to 
play with his circuts. "We're coming up to the ship..." He limped up 
to a clearing... huh?" He looked down at Crosswise. "Out of three 
your the only one not damaged and you take us to the wrong ship?"


Blackstorm:
 
Blackstorm was tired to wait the new comers signal, so she took off 
and flew towards the ark. when she saw Side way. She landed some 
miles far of him and she transformed to her beast mode. Cautionsly 
she walked towards the group, hoping to know more about those bots. 

Sideways:

Sideways limped up to the ship and shook his head. "Well we might as 
well turn around and try again." He stoof up right and transformed 
and the two smaller bots formed into a rider and the two started off.

Blackstorm:

Blackstorm saw that, she carefully follow them

Sideways smiled to himself. "That dragon bot was a bombshell wasn't 
she boys." The minicons whistled and he laughed and braked. "Hmmm 
Looks like the terrains rough ahead, Rook you check out see if we can 
get by on wheels, me and crosswise will stay here." He transformed 
and became his bot form and crosswise formed his head...
BlackStorm:
 
BlackStorm stopped and hide, she was very daring following a lone 
that bot... Perhaps she have to call her babysiter after all, plus 
she have to come back to her patrol. She moved slowly trying to left 
the area.

SideWays looked around. "What do you mean you heard something?" He 
turned and a visor slid over his eyes. "A bot!" He raised his arms 
and the guns slid out. "Freeze!"

BlackStorm:

The femme stopped and  waited. But she was full awared 

Sideways reached her quickly. "Name, faction, etc, be quick about it."

Blackstorm:

"BlackStorm,  Decepticon, Scout"replied the femme"May I transform?"

Sideways chuckled. "Your either young or neive." A true decepticon 
would have lied." He nodded. "Heh, go ahead, but know this theres 
another bot with me and he'll be back soon."

Blackstorm:

Blackstorm felt as fool, MAxima wouldn't like this and her chances to 
get good mission and receive honors from Hydras was vanishing. She 
tranformed to her bot mode. 

Sideways smiled. "Why your a child." He chuckled. "And your a 
decepticon., well then BlackStorm, I am Sideways, and i too am a 
Decepticon." He lowered his weapon.

BlackStorm:

"I'm not a child...."replied the femme"that means that we aren't 
enemies, are we"

SideWays chuckled. "No, were allies." He lowered his guns and raised 
his hand in greeting.

BlackStorm:

"Some nanoclick you said that I'm a child "said BlackStorm"I presume 
that you said that 'cause you belive that I'm inoccent; but I 
don't"her tone was neutral but almost friendly " what do you want?"

Sideways smiled. "I apologise, i am here trying to find megatron, and 
optimus prime." Rook ran by BlackStorm and stood next to sideways 
looking up at the femme

"Megaron, Megatron, where have I heard that name?"thought the femm, 
she said "who's your little friend?"

Sideways chuckled,  "Thats Rook, he's a minicon, he can err, unlock 
new powers that i can use."

BlackStorm"I see"replied the femme
